doc:
Edward Mannix https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edward_Mannix 0 This article is about the voice actor, for the film producer, see Eddie Mannix. Edward Mannix (1928-1995) was an American voice actor, author and journalist. He is mainly known for his work in dubbing films and TV shows in Rome and Los Angeles, including Caliber 9, Golgo 13: The Professional and Robotech: The Movie. He was arguably best known for being the English voice of actor Bud Spencer.His published works include An End to Fury, A Journal of Love and The Widower. He was also a stringer for The Ring while living in Italy. This_article is about the_voice_actor , for the_film_producer , see Eddie_Mannix . Edward_Mannix_(_1928-1995_) was an_American_voice_actor , author_and_journalist . He is_mainly_known for his_work in dubbing films and TV_shows in Rome and Los_Angeles , including Caliber_9 , Golgo_13 : The_Professional_and_Robotech : The_Movie . He was_arguably_best_known for being the_English_voice of actor_Bud_Spencer.His published works include An_End to Fury , A_Journal of Love and The_Widower . He was also a_stringer for The_Ring while living in Italy .
